Scattershot/Dark One/Breakdown:



Breakdown transformed to robot mode, now behind the other two Preds, unable 
to open fire.


Scattershot landed, Dark One taking the lead.

"Ha!  Corner yourself by the sealed base doors why don't you!" Dark One 
yelled, autoguns still firing at Stalker.  Dark One raised his sub-machine 
gun, firing off 7 explosive shells at Stalker's back.

Scattershot fired off 10 armor piercing rounds at the back of Stalker's legs.
